siteMetadata.title: From My Head to the Cloud
siteMetadata.subtitle: Where I put my ideas and experiences into words.

frontmatter.title: Apple Sign-In and the issue we faced with Expo
frontmatter.description: Now, Apple has mandated to provide Apple Sign-In as an equivalent option if your app is providing other social logins(FB, Gmail Twitter, etc) as well. In this guide I tried to simplify the entire process and how we resolved an issue we faced while using Expo for Apple Signin
